title: Duck hunter's dilemma
creator_credit: Minnesota Museum of Natural History and University of Minnesota
brief_description: Shows the nature and extent of present waterfowl problems in America. Illustrates how game biologists are carrying out field experiments on bird habits and how the results and conclusions of this research are being put to practical use in the preservation and fostering of the waterfowl population.
